page.name: Kaptchuk & Miller 2005
page.content:
Read: Kaptchuk and Miller 2005.Â  As you read, consider the following questions:

  1. Does your workplace use the opposition, integration or pluralism model as described by Kaptchuk & Miller?
  2. Which of the three (opposition, integration, or pluralism) best serves our profession?
  3. Which of the three (opposition, integration, or pluralism) best serves our patients?
